message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.DS, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper focuses on wireless sensor networks and their deployment, which falls under the scope of networking and internet architecture. 
2. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper models the sensor deployment problem as a source coding problem with distortion reflecting sensing accuracy, which is a key concept in information theory. 
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper discusses the dynamic sensor deployment in both homogeneous and heterogeneous WSNs, which involves control and optimization of the system. 
4. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper proposes two algorithms (RL and DA) to optimize sensor deployment, which falls under the scope of data structures and algorithms. 
5. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper discusses the sensing performance of WSNs, which can be related to multimedia applications that require accurate sensing and data collection.
